metadata.description: Azure region for all resources.
Environment name used in resource naming (e.g., prod, staging).
Google OAuth Client ID for authentication.
PostgreSQL administrator password.
Email address of the global admin user.
API container image (defaults to quickstart placeholder).
Web container image (defaults to quickstart placeholder).
Custom domain for the web app (e.g., codec-chat.com). Leave empty to skip custom domain binding.
Custom domain for the API (e.g., api.codec-chat.com). Leave empty to skip custom domain binding.
Set to true on a second deployment pass to bind managed TLS certificates to custom domains. Requires a prior deployment with this set to false so that hostnames are registered first.
Deploy the voice VM (mediasoup SFU + coturn). Set to false to skip voice infrastructure.
SSH public key for the voice VM admin user. Required when voiceVmEnabled is true.
Source IP or CIDR allowed to SSH into the voice VM. Defaults to unrestricted; tighten in production.
HMAC-SHA1 shared secret for coturn time-limited credentials. Required when voiceVmEnabled is true.
Shared secret for the SFU internal API. Required when voiceVmEnabled is true.
SSH public key for the azureuser admin account.
Name of the existing Azure Container Registry (for AcrPull role assignment).
VM admin username.
Source IP prefix allowed to SSH into the VM. Restrict to your operator CIDR in production (e.g. "203.0.113.0/24"). Defaults to "*" for convenience but should be tightened.

variables.cloudInit:
#cloud-config

package_update: true
package_upgrade: false

packages:
  - docker.io
  - docker-compose-plugin
  - curl
  - jq

runcmd:
  - systemctl enable docker
  - systemctl start docker
  - mkdir -p /opt/voice
  - chown azureuser:azureuser /opt/voice

parameters.apiBaseUrl: [if(not(equals(parameters('apiCustomDomain'), '')), createObject('value', format('https://{0}', parameters('apiCustomDomain'))), createObject('value', format('https://{0}.{1}', variables('apiAppName'), reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Resources/deployments', 'container-apps-env'), '2025-04-01').outputs.defaultDomain.value)))]
parameters.corsAllowedOrigins: [if(not(equals(parameters('webCustomDomain'), '')), createObject('value', format('https://{0}', parameters('webCustomDomain'))), createObject('value', format('https://{0}.{1}', variables('webAppName'), reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Resources/deployments', 'container-apps-env'), '2025-04-01').outputs.defaultDomain.value)))]

metadata.description: Internal URL of the mediasoup SFU (e.g., http://<voice-vm-ip>:3001).
TURN server URL for WebRTC ICE (e.g., turn:<voice-vm-ip>:3478).
Key Vault secret URL for the TURN shared secret. Leave empty if voice is not enabled.
Key Vault secret URL for the SFU internal API key. Leave empty if voice is not enabled.
Custom domain name for the API (e.g., api.codec-chat.com). Leave empty to skip.
Resource ID of the managed certificate for the custom domain.

ingress.customDomains: [if(and(not(equals(parameters('customDomainName'), '')), not(equals(parameters('managedCertificateId'), ''))), createArray(createObject('name', parameters('customDomainName'), 'certificateId', parameters('managedCertificateId'), 'bindingType', 'SniEnabled')), if(not(equals(parameters('customDomainName'), '')), createArray(createObject('name', parameters('customDomainName'), 'bindingType', 'Disabled')), createArray()))]

configuration.secrets: [concat(createArray(createObject('name', 'connection-string', 'keyVaultUrl', format('{0}secrets/ConnectionStrings--Default', parameters('keyVaultUri')), 'identity', 'system'), createObject('name', 'google-client-id', 'keyVaultUrl', format('{0}secrets/Google--ClientId', parameters('keyVaultUri')), 'identity', 'system'), createObject('name', 'global-admin-email', 'keyVaultUrl', format('{0}secrets/GlobalAdmin--Email', parameters('keyVaultUri')), 'identity', 'system')), if(not(equals(parameters('voiceTurnKvUrl'), '')), createArray(createObject('name', 'voice-turn-secret', 'keyVaultUrl', parameters('voiceTurnKvUrl'), 'identity', 'system')), createArray()), if(not(equals(parameters('voiceSfuInternalKeyKvUrl'), '')), createArray(createObject('name', 'voice-sfu-internal-key', 'keyVaultUrl', parameters('voiceSfuInternalKeyKvUrl'), 'identity', 'system')), createArray()))]

containers.name: api
containers.env: [concat(createArray(createObject('name', 'ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT', 'value', 'Production'), createObject('name', 'ConnectionStrings__Default', 'secretRef', 'connection-string'), createObject('name', 'Google__ClientId', 'secretRef', 'google-client-id'), createObject('name', 'Api__BaseUrl', 'value', parameters('apiBaseUrl')), createObject('name', 'Cors__AllowedOrigins', 'value', parameters('corsAllowedOrigins')), createObject('name', 'Storage__Provider', 'value', 'AzureBlob'), createObject('name', 'Storage__AzureBlob__ServiceUri', 'value', parameters('storageBlobEndpoint')), createObject('name', 'GlobalAdmin__Email', 'secretRef', 'global-admin-email')), if(not(equals(parameters('sfuApiUrl'), '')), createArray(createObject('name', 'Voice__MediasoupApiUrl', 'value', parameters('sfuApiUrl')), createObject('name', 'Voice__TurnServerUrl', 'value', parameters('turnServerUrl'))), createArray()), if(not(equals(parameters('voiceTurnKvUrl'), '')), createArray(createObject('name', 'Voice__TurnSecret', 'secretRef', 'voice-turn-secret')), createArray()), if(not(equals(parameters('voiceSfuInternalKeyKvUrl'), '')), createArray(createObject('name', 'Voice__SfuInternalKey', 'secretRef', 'voice-sfu-internal-key')), createArray()))]
